meanings.sent1: He wore a stylish ascots to the formal event.
meanings.sent2: The gentleman's ascots matched his suit perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The ascots added a touch of elegance to his outfit.
meanings.sent4: His ascots was like a colorful ribbon around his neck.
meanings.sent5: The silk ascots felt smooth against his skin.

meanings.sent1: She wrapped the ascots around her neck to keep warm.
meanings.sent2: The soft ascots kept the chill away on the winter day.
meanings.sent3: Her ascots fluttered in the wind like a gentle butterfly.
meanings.sent4: The ascots was a cozy companion during the cold evening.
meanings.sent5: The colorful ascots brightened up her outfit.

meanings.definition: A type of accessory worn around the neck.
meanings.sent1: The ascots added a pop of color to his attire.
meanings.sent2: She chose a delicate ascots to complement her dress.
meanings.sent3: His ascots was the talk of the party, everyone admired it.
meanings.sent4: The ascots was like a little piece of art around his neck.
meanings.sent5: The intricate design of the ascots caught everyone's eye.
